message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm definitely interested, but $14,000 is a bit higher than I was hoping to spend.  How about $13,000? I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can see if I can do a bit better than that. How about $13,800?
